column4: anyone knows why my sys only shows 3.2 of 4GB ram on 64bit version? (dmidecode correctly shows 2x2GB)
additionaly check your BIOS setting if some space is reserved, i have 4GB and "only" 3,5 are accessable
not if you reserve ram in the bios, e.g. for the grafic card
IntuitiveNipple: thanks guys, that was it, enabled remapping from the bios :)
